infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: MyMacroAI reads your health data including sleep, heart rate, and activity to provide personalized nutrition and recovery insights tailored to your body's needs.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: MyMacroAI writes health data like water intake, body weight, and nutrition to help you track your progress and keep all your health data in one place.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MyMacroAI uses your camera to scan food, barcodes, and nutrition labels for instant macro tracking with AI-powered analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MyMacroAI uses your microphone for voice-based food logging, allowing you to log meals hands-free by simply speaking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MyMacroAI accesses your photo library to analyze food photos for nutrition information and to save progress photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: MyMacroAI saves your physique progress photos and food scan results to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: MyMacroAI uses this data to provide personalized nutrition recommendations and improve the app experience.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: MyMacroAI accesses your calendar to schedule meal reminders and sync nutrition goals with your daily schedule.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: MyMacroAI creates calendar events for meal planning and nutrition reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: MyMacroAI uses reminders to help you stay on track with your nutrition goals and meal timing.
